urls.title: How Trump’s COVID-19 Failure Betrayed Our Military and Veterans - The Bulwark
urls.description: A.B. Stoddard on how President Trump’s coronavirus fantasies hamstrung the military and prevented the VA system from being able to prepare for the pandemic.
